attributes.action: Military Support/Martial Law in times of riot and crisis
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see Military Support/Martial Law imposed in cities within the UK at times of civil unrest, riot and crisis.
The current situation in London, Leeds, Birmingham, Bristol and Liverpool is a reminder of the consiquences of the Governments plans to cut back on front line Police services.
By allowing Martial Law to be imposed on our cities it will allow normal order to be resorted long before thousands of innocent people's lives are destroyed by their homes, businesses and property being wrecked by mindless violence.
In the UK we have tens of thousands of soldiers in the Army, Navy and Air force who are all trained to deal with civil unrest as part of their peace keeping duties with NATO and the UN. We should put this valuable resource to good use.
The soldiers do not need to be armed or even autonamous, they would be placed under the command of the local police force who they are helping so there is less fear of soliders etc becoming too heavy handed or over reaching.
